cards.title: 容器的操作
cards.content:
# 启动一个新的容器

```sh
docker run [OPTIONS] ${IMAGE_NAME} [COMMAND] [ARG...]
```

# 运行已存在的容器

```sh
docker start [OPTIONS] ${CONTAINER_NAME...}

# 重启正在运行的容器
docker restart [OPTIONS] ${CONTAINER_NAME...}
```
cards.html:
启动一个新的容器

docker run [OPTIONS] ${IMAGE_NAME} [COMMAND] [ARG...]

运行已存在的容器

docker start [OPTIONS] ${CONTAINER_NAME...}

# 重启正在运行的容器
docker restart [OPTIONS] ${CONTAINER_NAME...}

cards.title: 包管理 - Debian 系
cards.content:
# Installing packages

```sh
apt-get install ${PACKAGE_NAME...}
```
# 卸载软件
```sh
apt-get remove ${PACKAGE_NAME...}
apt-get purge ${PACKAGE_NAME...} # 卸载软件并移除相关配置文件
```
# Upgrading packages
```sh
apt-get -u upgrade
```
# Upgrading to a new release

```sh
apt-get -u dist-upgrade
```

# Removing unused package files
```sh
apt-get clean
apt-get autoclean
```
# 软件源配置文件
```sh
/etc/apt/sources.list
/etc/apt/sources.list.d
```
cards.html:
Installing packages

apt-get install ${PACKAGE_NAME...}

卸载软件

apt-get remove ${PACKAGE_NAME...}
apt-get purge ${PACKAGE_NAME...} # 卸载软件并移除相关配置文件

Upgrading packages

apt-get -u upgrade

Upgrading to a new release

apt-get -u dist-upgrade

Removing unused package files

apt-get clean
apt-get autoclean

软件源配置文件

/etc/apt/sources.list
/etc/apt/sources.list.d

text-processing.desc: 类 Unix 环境下的文本处理工具

cards.title: Vi / Vim
cards.content:
# Exiting / Quiting

|  指令                 | 备注                          |
|  ----                 | ----                          |
| `:wq` / `:x` / `ZZ`   | Save and close file           |
| `q!` / `ZQ`           | Close file, abandon changes   |
| `Esc`                 | Exit insert mode              |


# Cursor navigating

|  指令             | 备注                                |
|  ----             | ----                               |
| `h`、`j`、`k`、`l` | `←`，`↓`、`↑`、`→`                  |
| `gg`              | First line                          |
| `G`               | Last line                           |
| `0` (zero)        | Start of line                       |
| `^`               | Start of line (after whitespace)    |
| `$`               | End of line                         |

# Clipboard

|  指令             | 备注                                   |
|  ----             | ----                                   |
| `yy` / `2yy`      | Yank (copy) a/2 line(s)                |
| `p`               | Put (paste) the clipboard after cursor |
| `dd` / `2dd`      | Delete (cut) a / 2 line(s)             |
| `x`               | Delete (cut) character                 |

# Reference

- [Devhints.io - Vim cheatsheet](https://devhints.io/vim)
- [vim.rotrr.com - Vim Cheat Sheet](https://devhints.io/vim)
cards.html:
Exiting / Quiting

指令 备注
:wq / :x / ZZ Save and close file
q! / ZQ Close file, abandon changes
Esc Exit insert mode

Cursor navigating

指令 备注
h、j、k、l ←，↓、↑、→
gg First line
G Last line
0 (zero) Start of line
^ Start of line (after whitespace)
$ End of line

Clipboard

指令 备注
yy / 2yy Yank (copy) a/2 line(s)
p Put (paste) the clipboard after cursor
dd / 2dd Delete (cut) a / 2 line(s)
x Delete (cut) character

Reference

  • Devhints.io - Vim cheatsheet
  • vim.rotrr.com - Vim Cheat Sheet

cards.title: Sed
cards.html:
In-place replacement (GNU)

sed -i -e 's/foo/bar/' example.md

cards.title: View files
cards.content:
# cat - concatenate
```sh
cat [-AbeEnstTuv] [--help] [--version] fileName

# -n 或 --number：由 1 开始对所有输出的行数编号。
# -b 或 --number-nonblank：和 -n 相似，只不过对于空白行不编号。
# -s 或 --squeeze-blank：把连续两行以上的空白行替换为换为一个。
```
